custom_css: .center_img {display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; margin-top: 50px; width: 50%;}

settings.title: Féliciations!
settings.text: Tu as trouvé un billet, il faut juste maintenant t'inscrire au concours pour être parmi les 3 gagnant.es!

settings.liquid:
<iframe src="https://app.calconic.com/api/embed/calculator/6548d41f1817b00029ce497a" sandbox="allow-same-origin allow-forms allow-scripts allow-top-navigation allow-popups-to-escape-sandbox allow-popups" title="Calconic_ Calculator" name="Calconic_ Calculator" height="400px" scrolling="no" style="width: 100%; border: 0; outline: none;"></iframe>
<script>
  (function() {
    window.addEventListener("message",function(t){
      var e="https://www.paypalobjects.com/api/checkout.4.0.141.js";
      if(!document.querySelector('script[src="'+e+'"]')&&t.data&&"LOAD_PAYPAL"===t.data.action){
      var a=document.createElement("script");a.src=e,a.async=!0,a.dataset={paypalCheckout:!0,noBridge:!0,state:"ppxo_meta",env:"production"},document.body.append(a)
      }if(t.data&&"CALCONIC_UPDATE_HEIGHT"===t.data.action){
      var s=document.querySelector('iframe[src="https://app.calconic.com/api/embed/calculator/'+t.data.payload.id+'"]');
      if(s){s.height=t.data.payload.height}}
    });
  })();
</script>

settings.text: 2 sacs de 300g par mois pendant 12 mois
Espresso à la maison, Filtre manuel, Latte Art ou Cupping + Origine

settings.title: Le prix pour chacun des 3 gagnants.es
